UpdateProductStockForOrder.Statement: UPDATE w2_ProductStock SET w2_ProductStock.stock = w2_ProductStock.stock - @item_quantity, w2_ProductStock.date_changed = getdate(), w2_ProductStock.last_changed = 'batch' FROM w2_ProductStock WHERE w2_ProductStock.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ProductStock.product_id = @product_id AND w2_ProductStock.variation_id = @variation_id
